item.description: ps_featuredproducts - Change the number of products displayed Details Component : ps_featuredproducts Status : Approved Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-667 Steps Step Description Expected result Change the option Number of products to be displayed" to 12" A message should appear in green.
